org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper

Class A_AttributeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper.A_AttributeConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlagConverter, PermissionConverter

    public abstract class A_AttributeConverter
extends Object
    This helper class is used to convert a tag of an xml file. Therefore the class defines the name of tag, which should be converted. If the name tag was found the class gets the document to convert it.
    Author:
    Rainer Steinegger - Synyx GmbH & Co. KG - rainer.steinegger@synyx.de

      Needed to set the tag name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • A_AttributeConverter

        public A_AttributeConverter(String tagName,
                    String parentName)
        Needed to set the tag name. If the parent tag name is null, the isSearchedTag() method does not evaluate the parent tag name.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the searched tag.
        parentName - The name of the parent tag.

    • Method Detail

      • convertTag

        public abstract void convertTag(org.dom4j.Element element)
                         throws Exception
        This method is called, if the tag was found.
        Parameters:
        element - The searched element.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isSearchedTag

        public boolean isSearchedTag(org.dom4j.Element element)
                      throws Exception
        Checks if the given tag is the searched tag. If the parent tag name is null, the isSearchedTag() method does not evaluate the parent tag name.
        Parameters:
        element - The element to check.
        Returns:
        True if this element is the searched one.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getTagName

        public String getTagName()
        Getter for the tag name.
        Returns:
        The name of the searched tag.

      • getParentName

        public String getParentName()
        Getter for the parent tag name.
        Returns:
        The name of the parent tag.
